data.text:
#27748
# Beijing: No halts in scientific cooperation with Russia

Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Zhao Lijian shared on Friday, at a press briefing, that the scientific cooperation between Russia and China continues undisrupted.

"As far as we know, at present, Sino-Russian scientific and technological cooperation and exchanges are developing normally," asserted Zhao adding that this type of cooperation between the two countries has been important for their bilateral relations.

He further continued by saying that the scientific exchange between Russia and China, in more recent years, "keeps a good momentum." Moreover, the Chinese Academy of Sciences told RIA Novosti that the organization continues to invite Russian scientists.

[Baha Breaking the News (BBN) / AY](http://news.teletrader.com/)
